pages.name: Hint #9
pages.text: Where hollow hymns in silence ring, and shadows cloak forgotten things. Seek the relics left to mourn. A soul awaits, both lost and worn.$(br)$(br)See the next page for the answer.

pages.title: Answer #9
pages.text: Find a lost soul in the soul church. It can be found in loot chests, or from the vault spawners.
